category.name: Data Sharing.Multi-Site Collaboration
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: IDSM_exclude_unpublished_components
preference.preference_description: Prevents replication of unpublished components when a published assembly is replicated.This preference can be used only in conjunction with remote imports; it is not used when you choose Tools->Export->Objects from the My Teamcenter menu to export components. Valid Values: TRUE - Unpublished components are not included when you perform a remote import of a published assembly and the Include Entire BOM command is enabled. FALSE - All components published and unpublished are included.
